titleStmt.title: Four discourses delivered to the clergy of the Diocess of Sarum ... by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert, Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library and the Folger Shakespeare Library.

(from t.p.) I. The truth of the Christian religion -- II. The divinity and death of Christ -- III. The infallibility and authority of the church -- IV. The obligations to continue in the communion of the church.
